text: West Wardsboro is an unincorporated village in the town of Wardsboro, Windham County, Vermont, United States. The community is located along Vermont Route 100 northwest of Brattleboro. West Wardsboro has a post office with ZIP code 05360. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Windham County, Vermont Category:Unincorporated communities in Vermont
title: West Wardsboro, Vermont
